marytts.signalproc.adaptation

Class FdpsolaAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • marytts.signalproc.adaptation.FdpsolaAdapter

  • public class FdpsolaAdapter
extends Object
    A class that supports voice conversion through weighted codebook mapping or joint-GMMs and FDPSOLA based prosody and vocal tract modifications Reference: Moulines, E. and W. Verhelst, 1995, “Time-Domain and Frequency-Domain Techniques for Prosodic Modification of Speech” in Kleijn and Paliwal (eds.), Speech Coding And Synthesis, pp. 519-555, Elsevier Science B.V., Netherlands.
    Author:
    Oytun Türk
